title: Walk-In Closets, One Seasonal Swimming Pool, Outdoor Grilling Area
posting_body: Welcome home to Kallisto at Bear Creek in Lakewood, CO!
Use this link for more information:
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 812 Sq.
Experience the entire world at your fingertips.
Here, you will find a range of apartments and townhomes that are complete with innovative finishes and recent renovations.
Dive into a life that is the ultimate combination of comfort, and luxury.
We offer one, two, and three-bedroom options that will always make you feel right at home.
Embrace the perfect blend of personal, and community amenities that will enhance your life, and improve your living experience.
Nestled in the foothills next to Morrison and Red Rocks, our outdoor scenery will leave you breathless.
Minutes away from C-470 or Hwy 285 your commute is convenient and beautiful.
Spend your days adventuring, exploring, or simply relaxing at your new home or in Bear Creek Park west on Morrison Rd.
There is something for everyone to enjoy in our neighborhood.
Start your new lifestyle, and join our community today.
Come home to Kallisto at Bear Creek.
- Year-Round Hot Tub and Heated Swimming Pool
At Kallisto at Bear Creek in Lakewood, we love your pets just as much as you do!
Because of that, Kallisto at Bear Creek is not just pet-friendly property, but a pet-enthusiastic property.
Our dog park is enjoyed by all and our pets LOVE living in the foothills!
From C470: Exit East on Morrison Road.
We are on the southwest corner of Morrison Road and Kipling Pkwy.
From Hampden: Take the Kipling exit north to Morrison Road west and then left into our community.
Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.
